Text: Land of the Free (Gamma Ray album):  Continuing a trend that would conclude with the band's fifth studio release, the lineup for the album was different from the previous one, as "Land of the Free" was the first Gamma Ray album to be released since the departure of Ralf Scheepers, leaving Kai Hansen to take up lead vocals.
